thread.title: Man Utd news: Jose Mourinho leaves star out of squad to face St Etienne | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd news: Jose Mourinho leaves star out of squad to face St Etienne | Metro News

author: Metro Sport Reporter For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd news: Jose Mourinho leaves star out of squad to face St Etienne | Metro News
text:
Metro Sport Reporter for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 1:09 pm Luke Shaw has been left out of Manchester United’s squad to face St Etienne (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester United defender Luke Shaw has been left out of the club’s matchday squad to face St Etienne in the Europa League at Old Trafford. 
It’s the fourth consecutive game that Shaw has been left out by Jose Mourinho and it raises further question marks over his future at the club. Paul Pogba shows brotherly love after Florentin is forced off injured 
Shaw’s made just one appearance in the last two-and-a-half months – against Wigan in the FA Cup – and has been overlooked for the likes of Marcos Rojo and Daley Blind. 
Mourinho questioned Shaw’s defending earlier on in the season after a defeat against Watford and the former Southampton left-back could leave the club this summer. Manchester United fixtures 
St-Etienne – Europa (H) Thu 16 Feb Blackburn – FA Cup (A) – Sat 18 Feb St-Etienne – Europa (A) – Wed 22 Feb Southampton – EFL (N) – Sun 26 Feb Bournemouth (H) – Sat 4 Mar Southampton (A) – Sun 12 Mar Middlesbrough (A) – Sun 19 Mar West Brom (H) – Sat 1 Apr
